description:
Prepare your theory test for Large Goods Vehicle (LGV or Lorry) with latest and official DSA question bank which has over 1000 questions.
For more screenshots and video demo, please visit our website:
www.uktheorytest.com

PREPARE BY TOPICS:
You can study the highway code by topic. All questions are sorted by topic. It also tells you the areas that each topic covers.

1) Accident Handling
2) Braking Systems
3) Documents
4) Drivers' Hours and Rest Periods
5) Environmental Issues
6) Leaving the Vehicle
7) Other Road Users
8) Restricted View
9) The Driver
10) The Road
11) Traffic Signs
12) Vehicle Condition
13) Vehicle Loading
14) Vehicle Weights and Dimensions

MOCK TEST MODE:
Mock test simulates the real test format. Questions are presented randomly from all the topics.

PROGRESS METER:
The app records your progress as you start giving practice tests.
It shows you a beautiful bar chart so that you can track your weak areas and give more focus on them.

FEATURE LIST:
Over 1000 multiple-choice questions.
1) Choose number of questions you would like in each test.
2) Shows test results in HTML format with explanation for each question.
3) E-mail yourself the test results and track your progress.
4) A new module, “Progress Meter” keeps track of how you are performing in a particular topic or mock test.
5) Special algorithm that randomizes questions every time you take a test.
6) Mock test has exactly similar format as in real test.
